[`FormulaContext`](FormulaContext)

## FormulaContext interface

The context in which a formula is evaluated. In most cases, [BasesEntry](BasesEntry) is the specific type to use.

 1.10.0

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface FormulaContext 
```
